build_basic_shelter.goal: First collect 16 acacia logs, craft them into at least 64 acacia planks, craft a wooden hoe, collect at least five seeds, then build a hollow 4x4x4 shelter with an entrance near a river and, within a 30-block radius of the shelter, create a small farm using the wooden hoe.
instructions: 1. Collect exactly 16 acacia logs near spawn.
2. Craft all 16 acacia logs into at least 64 acacia planks.
3. Craft a wooden hoe using acacia planks and sticks.
4. Explore near spawn and choose a flat area close to a river to build the shelter.
5. Build a hollow 4x4x4 shelter using acacia planks: four walls, four blocks wide in each direction, and four blocks high.
6. Leave a one-block-wide entrance in one wall so that the player can walk in and out.
7. After the shelter is complete, use the wooden hoe to till the ground within a 30-block radius of the shelter.
8. Collect at least five seeds and plant them in the tilled farmland near the river to create a small farm.
